Description: Rank the peptide/protein is assigned in the cohort with 1 being the highest expression of the peptide/protein in the cohort and occurrence being the lowest assigned rank
The number of times the peptide/protein was identified in cohort
Fold change of peptide/protein to median of cohort
Z-score of peptide/protein to median of cohort
P-value of Z-score of peptide/protein. Low p-value means high significance (peptide/protein is differentially  expressed from the cohort median)
Notes on preprocessing steps affecting the peptide/protein, e.g. imputation, single peptide ids, found in batch
Log10(intensity) of the peptide/protein. For proteins, the range is 3-12 with a median of 7.5; for peptides the range is 3-11 with a median of 6.5.
Position of P-site from PhosphoSitePlus (PSP) database according to MaxQuant localization
All potential positions of P-site from PhosphoSitePlus (PSP) database
Upstream kinase of protein which the peptide is found in
Domain (if any) which P-site is found in
Effect of modification on protein
Effect of modification on biological processes
Interaction being induced by modification
Notes on other cellular regulatory effects of modification
Number of low throughput studies finding modification in the PSP database
Number of high throughput studies finding modification in the PSP database
Number of studies  finding modification from PSP creator â†’ Cell Signaling Technology
Weblink to PhosphoSitePlus website for protein in which modification is
Sequence with modifications of peptide measured by MS and identified using MaxQuant software
Uniprot identifiers
